com.hp.hpl.jena.sdb
Class SDBFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.hp.hpl.jena.sdb.SDBFactory

public class SDBFactory
extends Object

Various operations to create or connect objects to do with SDB: SDBConnections, Stores, Models, Graphs. Convenience calls.
